enableLeadOre.comment: Generate Lead Ore in The Overworld.

enablePyriteOre.comment: Generate Pyrite Ore in The Nether.

enableGalenaOre.comment: Generate Galena Ore in The Overworld.

enableTungstenOre.comment: Generate Tungsten Ore in The End.

enableRubyOre.comment: Generate Ruby Ore in The Overworld.

enableSphaleriteOre.comment: Generate Sphalerite Ore in The Nether.

enableSapphireOre.comment: Generate Sapphire Ore in The Overworld.

enableSilverOre.comment: Generate Silver Ore in The Overworld.

RubberTreeBaseHeight.comment: Basic height for not-spire part of rubber tree

RubberTreeCount.comment: Amount of trees to spawn in successful case

RubberTreeSpireHeight.comment: Height of spire of rubber tree

enableEndLoot.comment: When true TechReborn will add ingots, machine frames and circuits to The End loot chests.

enableNetherLoot.comment: When true TechReborn will add ingots, machine frames and circuits to Nether loot chests.

enableOverworldLoot.comment: When true TechReborn will add ingots, machine frames and circuits to OverWorld loot chests.
